column3: to which it is made fast at the center by a pneumatic holder; to assure the perfect adhesion of this holder
column4: it is as well to wet the circular elastic ring of the holder before applying it to the metallic surface. When this is done
column5: the table may be made to rotate quickly without fear of detaching the plate by the rapidity of the movement. The plate is placed in a perfectly horizontal position

column7: and distributed by means of a triangular piece of soft paper
column8: so as to cover equally all the parts of the plate. Care should be taken not to flow too much liquid over the plate
column9: and when the latter is everywhere coated
column10: the excess is poured off into a different vessel from that which contains the filtered mixture
column11: or else into a filter resting on that vessel.
